an3.13:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo nice kule paccajato hoti, candalakule va venakule va nesadakule va rathakarakule va pukkusakule va dalidde appannapanabhojane kasiravuttike, yattha kasirena ghasacchado labbhati.
an3.13:1.6: So ca hoti dubbanno duddasiko okotimako bavhabadho kano va kuni va khanjo va pakkhahato va, na labhi annassa panassa vatthassa yanassa malagandhavilepanassa seyyavasathapadipeyyassa.
an3.13:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno khattiyassa muddhavasittassa jettho putto hoti abhiseko anabhisitto acalappatto.
an3.13:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, raja hoti khattiyo muddhavasitto.
an3.13:3.8: Ya hissa, bhikkhave, pubbe anabhisittassa abhisekasa sa patippassaddha.
an3.13:3.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an3.13:4.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggala santo samvijjamana bhikkhusu.
an3.13:4.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussilo hoti papadhammo asuci sankassarasamacaro paticchannakammanto assamano samanapatinno abrahmacari brahmacaripatinno antoputi avassuto kasambujato.
an3.13:4.7: ‘itthannamo kira bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati’ti.
an3.13:4.9: ‘kudassu nama ahampi asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharissami’ti.
an3.13:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silava hoti kalyanadhammo.
an3.13:5.4: ‘itthannamo kira bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati’ti.
an3.13:5.6: ‘kudassu nama ahampi asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharissami’ti.
an3.13:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araham hoti khinasavo.
an3.13:6.4: ‘itthannamo kira bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati’ti.
an3.13:6.6: ‘kudassu nama ahampi asavanam khaya …pe… sacchikatva upasampajja viharissami’ti.
an3.13:6.8: Ya hissa, bhikkhave, pubbe avimuttassa vimuttasa sa patippassaddha.
an3.13:6.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggala santo samvijjamana bhikkhusu”ti.
